MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the KY16 postcode area of St. Andrews. It has been necessary for our engineers to carry out an emergency shutdown at 6:30pm to carry out emergency repairs on a low hanging overhead line near Tosh Cottage and this may affect the supply to your property. We will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 8:30pm. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 4:32pm on Wednesday, 03 March 2021
